api.title: Turkiye API
api.description:
## Overview

This REST API provides comprehensive data about Turkey's administrative divisions including provinces, districts, neighborhoods, and villages with demographic and geographical information.

## Features

- üó∫Ô∏è Complete geographical data for Turkey
- üìä Population and area statistics
- üîç Advanced filtering and search capabilities
- üìÑ Pagination support
- üéØ Field selection for optimized responses

## Query Parameters

All list endpoints support:
- `name`: Filter by name (partial match)
- `minPopulation` / `maxPopulation`: Population range filters
- `offset` / `limit`: Pagination
- `fields`: Comma-separated fields to return
- `sort`: Sort by field (prefix with `-` for descending)

## Response Format

All responses follow a consistent JSON format with proper error handling.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.sort: Sorting (put '-' before field name for descending order)

parameter_descriptions.min_population_province: The minimum population of the province
parameter_descriptions.max_population_province: The maximum population of the province
parameter_descriptions.min_population_district: The minimum population of the district
parameter_descriptions.max_population_district: The maximum population of the district
parameter_descriptions.min_population_neighborhood: The minimum population of the neighborhood
parameter_descriptions.max_population_neighborhood: The maximum population of the neighborhood
parameter_descriptions.min_population_village: The minimum population of the village
parameter_descriptions.max_population_village: The maximum population of the village
parameter_descriptions.min_population_town: The minimum population of the town
parameter_descriptions.max_population_town: The maximum population of the town
parameter_descriptions.min_area_province: The minimum area of the province
parameter_descriptions.max_area_province: The maximum area of the province
parameter_descriptions.min_area_district: The minimum area of the district
parameter_descriptions.max_area_district: The maximum area of the district
parameter_descriptions.min_altitude_province: The minimum altitude of the province
parameter_descriptions.max_altitude_province: The maximum altitude of the province
parameter_descriptions.is_coastal: The province is coastal or not
parameter_descriptions.is_metropolitan: The province is metropolitan or not
parameter_descriptions.fields_return: The fields to be returned (comma separated)
parameter_descriptions.sort_order: The sorting order (put '-' before the field name for descending order)
parameter_descriptions.extend_response: Extend the response with additional data (neighborhoods and villages)
